content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Lack of specialized online courses for people with health concerns",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects health experts with people who have specific health concerns to create and sell online courses.",
    "content_solution": "Create a blog that provides free content on various health concerns and promote the online courses as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Udemy", "Coursera", "Skillshare"],
    "differentiator": "Specialized courses specifically designed for people with health concerns"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty finding reliable information on health concerns",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a chatbot that can provide reliable information on specific health concerns.",
    "content_solution": "Create a YouTube channel that provides free information on various health concerns and promote chatbot service as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["WebMD", "Mayo Clinic"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized and interactive chatbot service"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of affordable mental health support",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects mental health experts with people who need affordable support and offer online sessions.",
    "content_solution": "Create a podcast that provides free mental health advice and promote the online sessions as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Talkspace", "BetterHelp"],
    "differentiator": "Affordable pricing and personalized matching with mental health experts"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty managing chronic pain",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects chronic pain patients with physical therapists to provide online exercises and pain management techniques.",
    "content_solution": "Create an eBook that provides various pain management techniques and promote the personalized exercise program as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Curelator", "PainScale"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized exercise programs and access to physical therapists"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of healthy meal options for people with dietary restrictions",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects people with dietary restrictions with chefs and nutrition experts to provide personalized meal plans and grocery lists.",
    "content_solution": "Create a blog that provides free recipes and meal plans for people with dietary restrictions and promote personalized plans as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Thistle", "Purple Carrot"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized meal plans and grocery lists"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty finding safe and effective workout routines for people with physical disabilities",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects people with physical disabilities with physical therapists and personal trainers to provide online workout routines.",
    "content_solution": "Create a YouTube channel that provides free workout routines and promote personalized routines as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Adaptive Fitness", "Disabled Sports USA"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized workout routines and access to physical therapists"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty managing medication schedules for elderly and disabled people",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects caregivers with elderly and disabled people to manage their medication schedules and provide reminders.",
    "content_solution": "Create a blog that provides free information on medication management and promote the personalized service as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["MedMinder", "PillPack"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized medication management and access to caregivers"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of support for caregivers of people with dementia",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects caregivers of people with dementia with support groups and dementia experts to provide advice and emotional support.",
    "content_solution": "Create a podcast that provides free advice and emotional support for caregivers of people with dementia and promote personalized support as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Alzheimer's Association", "Caregiver Action Network"],
    "differentiator": "Personalized support and access to dementia experts"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty finding affordable and reliable home care services for elderly and disabled people",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects elderly and disabled people with affordable and reliable home care services.",
    "content_solution": "Create a blog that provides free information on home care services and promote the personalized service as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Care.com", "Home Instead Senior Care"],
    "differentiator": "Affordable pricing and personalized matching with home care services"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of specialized online courses for people with hearing loss",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform that connects people with hearing loss with ASL instructors to provide online courses.",
    "content_solution": "Create a blog that provides free information on ASL and promote the online courses as a paid solution.",
    "competitors": ["Gallaudet University", "ASLdeafined"],
    "differentiator": "Specialized courses specifically designed for people with hearing loss"
  }
]
